member.name: M:Laga.GeneticAlgorithm.GenrPopulation.NumPopulationSwap(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Genr8 a Population of random integers, between min and max value.
member.param: The minimum value in the chromosome, inclusive
The maximum value in the chromosome, inclusive

example.code:
GenrPopulation pop = new GenrPopulation(5); int[][] intPop = pop.NumPopulationSwap(0, 10);
results Chromosome: 0 - 1, 4, 8, 6, 2, 10, 9, 5, 0, 7, 3, Chromosome: 1 - 5, 4, 0, 1, 7, 6, 8, 10, 2, 3, 9, Chromosome: 2 - 1, 6, 10, 7, 3, 5, 9, 2, 0, 8, 4, Chromosome: 3 - 9, 1, 4, 6, 10, 2, 7, 5, 8, 0, 3, Chromosome: 4 - 2, 5, 0, 7, 6, 1, 4, 3, 8, 9, 10,

member.name: M:Laga.GeneticAlgorithm.GenrPopulation.BinaryPopulationInt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Genr8 a binary Population 101011...

member.name: M:Laga.GeneticAlgorithm.GenrPopulation.BinaryPopulationChr(System.Int32)
member.summary: Genr8 a binary Population '1','0','1','0','1','1'...

member.name: M:Laga.GeneticAlgorithm.GenrPopulation.CharPopulation(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Genr8 a Population composed by random chars. based on this link: http://www.asciitable.com/
member.param: the start number for the table, inclusive: Eg: 97
the end number for the table, inclusive: Eg: 122

example.code:
GenrPopulation pop = new GenrPopulation(5); char[][] charPop = pop.CharPopulation(30, 50, 100);
/// result: Chromosome: 0 - Q, 5, A, P, ^, \, T, ^, F, ;, U, ?, Z, :, 5, E, B, ], S, H, A, L, I, =, _, ~, E, B, @, H Chromosome: 1 - C, 7, T, ], W, W, 7, ?, 4, b, 4, C, L, ], I, Z, J, 8, :, A, S, b, L, 9, a, 7, Q, 6, U, T Chromosome: 2 - H, C, O, b, ], O, M, a, H, C, @, 5, [, U, F, b, 2, P, X, 7, W, ?, :, d, Z, E, P, L, a, R Chromosome: 3 - 7, 3, N, E, L, U, Y, N, 2, ^, ?, M, U, \, 3, O, 9, [, X, c, 7, 3, C, O, b, ;, ;, P, :, I Chromosome: 4 - d, 2, 2, Z, =, ?, L, H, ;, V, :, H, P, ^,], ;, O, B, b, [, @, Y, Y, b, L, 5, T, c, G

member.summary: A roulette wheel selection distributed on a sigmoid curve
member.param: The maximum number of selected individuals in the roulette wheel
The minimum number of selected individuals in the roulette wheel

The last index in the population. 5 is the sixth individual
the factor decay, values between 0.00 and 1.00

member.summary: To sort chromosomes in populations according to fitness evaluation.

member.summary: constructor

member.name: M:Laga.GeneticAlgorithm.RankingSort.BidirectionalBubbleSort(System.Object[][],System.Single[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sort the individuals in the population by fitness value.
member.param: Array of fitness in the population. Only two flavors are supported: int[] and float[]
if is true the sort is by min to max, else max to min

member.name: M:Laga.GeneticAlgorithm.RankingSort.BidirectionalBubbleSort(System.Char[][],System.Int32[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: An optimised BidirectionalBubbleSort method. Sort the individuals in the population by fitness value.
member.param: Array of fitness in the population. Only 2 flavors are supported: int[] and float[]
if is true the sort is by min to max, else max to min
member.returns: automatically the population is sorted. the original population will be modified.
